00016 class EXIT

00018 public:
00020 
00022     double apriori_mutual_info(const double &in_sigma2A, 
00023                                const double &lim=100 
00024                                )
00025     {
00026         sigma2A = in_sigma2A;
00027         return double(1)-itpp::quad(&gaussian_fct, -lim, lim);
00028     };
00030 
00033     itpp::vec generate_apriori_info(const itpp::bvec &bits)
00034     {
00035         itpp::BPSK bpsk;
00036         return (-sigma2A/2)*bpsk.modulate_bits(bits)+sqrt(sigma2A)*itpp::randn(bits.length());
00037     };
00039 
00042     double extrinsic_mutual_info(const itpp::vec &obs, 
00043                                  const itpp::bvec &cond, 
00044                                  const int &N=100 
00045                                  );
00046 private:
00047     static double sigma2A;
00048     friend double itpp::quad(double (*f)(double), double a, double b, double tol);
00049     static double gaussian_fct(const double x)
00050     {
00051         return (1.0/sqrt(sigma2A*itpp::m_2pi))*exp(-itpp::sqr(x-(sigma2A/2.0))/(2.0*sigma2A))*log2(1+exp(-x));
00052     };
00053 };
